attributes.action: national lottery should be more than ONE big winner spread the winnings
attributes.background:
Look at the winnings of the national lotto amd make more winner's every week not one single person needs that amount you can still make a life changing amount with less money 
Spread the kindness

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The setting of prize limits is an operational decision for Camelot Group, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you would like the National Lottery to be brought under the direct control of the UK Government, you could start a petition calling for this to happen.
